body.p: Welcome to the Calvary Austin Worship Ministry! We at Calvary Chapel believe that the worship of God should be inspirational. Music is one of the different formats by which man can express feelings, desires, hope, peace, joy and love toward God.

"I Will", Live Worship from Calvary Chapel of Austin, is now available at Family Christian Stores at the Highland Mall, Brodie Oaks (South) and Lakeline Plaza (Cedar Park) locations. It is also available at the Calvary Chapel of Austin Bookstore. You can also take your credit card orders by phone at 512-719-4667. Pick up a copy for you and your friends!
Songs from "I Will, Live Worship from Calvary Chapel of Austin", are receiving radio airplay on the following Calvary Satellite Network stations:
WGPS Elizabeth City, NC ("I Will Raise My Hands", "I Will Rise", "Draw Me Close" and "I Will Give You Everything")
WPGT Roanoke Rapids, NC ("I Will Raise My Hands", "I Will Rise", "Draw Me Close" and "I Will Give You Everything")
WJCA Albion, NY ("Your Word is You", "I Will Raise My Hands", "I Will Rise", "Draw Me Close" and "I Will Give You Everything")
WREQ Elmira, NY ("Your Word is You", "I Will Raise My Hands", "I Will Rise", "Draw Me Close" and "I Will Give You Everything")
WIFF Binghamton, NY ("Your Word is You", "I Will Raise My Hands", "I Will Rise", "Draw Me Close" and "I Will Give You Everything")
body.h2:
New CD Release: "I Will" - Updated
April 3, 2004
body.p: The Calvary Austin Worship Team is pleased to announce the release of their first worship CD, "I Will". The CD features songs written and performed by members of the worship team. We hope you enjoy listening to it as much as we were blessed to produce it.

td.p: Resources - Music Chords and Lyrics for all songs
Behind the Music - Learn the stories behind the songs
